text.p: Steers and heifers were steady to $1.00 per cwt lower on a dressed basis delivered (paid on hot carcass weights), USDA said.
Dressed Basis Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1200-1300 lbs 112.00 to mostly 113.00 (weighted average 112.75).
Dressed Basis Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1100-1200 lbs 112.00 to mostly 113.00, few 111.00. (weighted average 112.44).
Trade rather slow. Slaughter steers and heifers on a live basis weak to 50 lower. Buyer inquiry and demand fairly good, seller interest liimited.
Live basis sales - Equivalent 3 percent shrink delivered and FOB, some FOB 4% shrink.

Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1200-1300 lbs 69.50, few 70.00. Slaughter Heifers - Few Select and Choice 2-3 1200 lbs 70.00. Confirmed - 2,500 Last Week - 25,200 Last Year - 10,000 Wk To Date - 7,500 Sm Pd Lst Wk- 36,000 Sm Pd Lst Yr- 15,600
